text: Stavridis () is a Greek family name with the etymological meaning "son of Stavros." The genitive case form Stavridou (Σταυρίδου) or Stavridi (Σταυρίδη) is applied to female name bearers. Notable people with this name include: * Eleftherios Stavridis (1893–1966), Greek journalist and politician * James G. Stavridis (born 1955), retired United States Navy admiral * Nikos Stavridis (1910–1987), Greek actor in film and theater * Vasilios Stavridis (1925–2016), Greek theologian and university teacher == References == Category:Greek- language surnames Category:Surnames
title: Stavridis
